item.title: The Political Opportunists Are Making This a Silly Season to Remember
item.description: Could Biden unilaterally amend the Constitution? Could Trump serve a third term? Anything is possible for these folks, at this time of year.

item.title: McConnell Warns Trump against Adopting a Democratic Foreign Policy
item.description: His criticism is reserved for advocates of retrenchment in Trump’s orbit whose influence is the subject of debate.

item.title: Don’t Use Pardons to Nullify the Death Penalty
item.description: Joe Biden would be showing his contempt for Congress once again if he nullifies every existing death sentence.

item.title: The Left’s Relativism Is No Match for Truth and Moral Clarity
item.description: Your support of National Review Institute helps carry forward a noble tradition.

item.title: Biden’s Lame-Duck Siccing of the IRS on Americans Cannot Stand
item.description: Before the next congressional term, Republicans must undo recent unilateral moves by Biden’s IRS that would subject millions of Americans to double ta...
